nodes.text: The Family Adventure Package was a package holiday advertised and sold by the Star Tours travel agency by the year 4.3 ABY to a new and exotic resort at The Edge of the Galaxy. It provided accommodations at the Rodon Value Pod Hotel and activities included touring the Solar Power Plant, planetary picnics, alien get-antiquated parties, and staying overnight at the Space Observatory. Rent-a-Speeder was the special feature of this package and there were pet accommodation.
The Family Adventure Package was first mentioned in Tokyo Disneyland's simulator ride theme park attraction Star Tours, which opened on July 12, 1989.
